snippet.title: BitCraft Online Steam Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
BitCraft Online is an open-world survival crafting MMORPG that features a persistent single-world experience. Carve out a cozy nook for yourself, master a player-driven economy, or transform untamed wilderness into thriving cities. Starting from humble beginnings, BitCraft Online allows players to leave a lasting impact on the world.
Music by Austin Wintory & Rachel Hardy

Wishlist the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3454650/BitCraft_Online

Join the community: 
Discord: https://discord.gg/bitcraft
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BitCraftOnline
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/bitcraftonline
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@bitcraftonline
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bitcraftonline
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BitCraftOnline
Bluesky: https://bsky.app/profile/bitcraftonline.bsky.social
